abstract: Sumitomo Trust and Banking has agreed to buy Citigroup’s Japanese asset manager, Nikko Asset Management, for about $1.1 billion, the Nikkei newspaper said Wednesday.
snippet: Sumitomo Trust and Banking has agreed to buy Citigroup’s Japanese asset manager, Nikko Asset Management, for about $1.1 billion, the Nikkei newspaper said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Sumitomo Trust and Banking has agreed to buy Citigroup‘s Japanese asset manager, Nikko Asset Management, for about 100 billion yen ($1.1 billion), the Nikkei newspaper said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Sumitomo Said to Buy Citigroup Japan Unit
